title: Pramukh Swami Medical College, Karamsad
text:
Pramukhswami Medical College, Karamsad is a medical college located in <a href="Karamsad">Karamsad</a>, <a href="Gujarat">Gujarat</a>. It was established in the year 1987. The college imparts the degree Bachelor of Medicine and Surgery (MBBS). Nursing and para-medical courses are also offered. The college is affiliated to <a href="Bhaikaka%20University">Bhaikaka University</a> and is recognized by <a href="Medical%20Council%20of%20India">Medical Council of India</a>. The selection to the college is done on the basis of merit through <a href="National%20Eligibility%20and%20Entrance%20Test">National Eligibility and Entrance Test</a>. Yearly undergraduate student intake is 150.
Courses.
Pramukhswami Medical College, Karamsad undertakes education and training of students MBBS courses. This college is offering 150 MBBS seats from 2019 of which 85% Seats are of state quota and 15% is for Nation Counselling.
